title: The Fish that nearly drowned
creator_credit: Moscow Educational Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A voice-over of aquarium scenes describing an Asian fish that can breathe air. Tells the story of various incidents that take place in the aquarium including the life habits of the fish showing how it builds its nest, and how an accident nearly causes its death.
